synopsis.p: Applies the CCG POS tagger on annotations.

description.p: applies the CCG POS tagger on annotations in the layer named wordLayer. Sentences are enforced if sentenceLayer is set.
If keepPreviousPos is set to true, then the POS tag predicted by CCG will not be added to annotations that already have a POS tag.

param-doc.name: keepPreviousPos
param-doc.p: Either to keep previous POS tags.

param-doc.name: model
param-doc.p: Path to the CCG POS model.

param-doc.name: silent
param-doc.p: Either to shut the CCG output (CCG can be quite verbose).

param-doc.name: executable
param-doc.p: Path to the CCG POS tagger executable.
